main.name: Krishna Kumar
main.description: I am from RCCIIT in B.Tech.I want to be a Software Engineer, currently unemployed but searching to get as best as I can.
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart and have a passion for coding. Born in a small town in Bihar in Gaya, I made my move to Kolkata where I study to be a Software Developer in B.Tech. I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: I attended RCCIIT for my first 4 years of the college. While here, I studied Information Technology, a 4 year lead-in to a Bachelors of Technology. This was a very hands-on experience focused more on building projects than general theory. Here I learnt data structures with C++ programming, and much more.
I attended 2 years program for my Senior secondary in BES and got 75% in the result. I had learnt there a lot from sports to theoretical subjects.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

testimonials.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
